content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column el_id=”topmenutext”]

TOP ONE PERCENT OF ALL ATTORNEYS

Over 30 Years of Combined Experience in Handling Federal Cases

Free Consultation
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

  • As seen in:

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
United States

Federal Criminal Defense Lawyers

Federal Criminal Defense Lawyers is a trusted name in federal criminal defense. Our accomplished attorneys have more than 40 years of combined experience defending the rights of clients charged with federal drug crimes, white-collar crimes, fraud offenses, violent crimes, sex crimes and more, and we treat our clients with the respect and individualized attention they deserve.

We know how frightening and overwhelming it can be to face criminal charges at the federal level and we are here to help you navigate the process as quickly and efficiently as possible.

Contact Federal Criminal Defense Lawyers today to schedule a free initial consultation with our respected federal criminal defense lawyers. We provide each and every client we represent with effective and efficient counsel without sacrificing the personalized approach we are known for. Call our firm today to find out how we can help you in your case.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1490331598404{margin-right: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;border-top-width: 1px !important;border-top-color: rgba(10,10,10,0.11) !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1490768520136{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3″]
What to Do First

Our defense attorneys have extensive experience defending clients in both state and federal courts and we know what it takes to raise a winning defense against federal charges.

Learn More
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1490768509171{border-right-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;border-left-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.07) !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.07) !important;border-right-style: solid !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3″]
How to Hire a Federal Criminal Defense Lawyer

A skilled federal criminal defense lawyer is a valuable resource to have on your side at any stage in the federal criminal process.

Learn More
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1490768493913{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3″]
Target Letter

If you receive what is known as a target letter from a federal prosecutor (Assistant United States Attorney) or the Department of Justice notifying you that you are the target or subject of a grand jury investigation.

Learn More
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1490768474649{border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;border-left-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important;border-left-style: solid !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-6″]
Arrested By Federal Agents

Having federal agents come to your home to execute a search warrant is an extremely terrifying and stressful experience. Find out what your different options are below.

Learn More
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”rowConsult”][vc_column]

Free Case Evaluation

Call us toll free at (855) 569-7300 or fill out the form below to receive a free and confidential initial consultation.

    [/vc_column][/vc_row]
